title: Update menu styling, reposition About page, and fix map coverage

requirements.text: Change the Navigation component color scheme to use green tones from the forest palette instead of current colors

quotes: CAN. U CAHNGE THE COLRO ASCHEME TO GREEN FOR THEMNUE PAGE

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation component uses green colors from the forest palette defined in tailwind.config.js
Both desktop and mobile navigation menu display the green color scheme
Color changes maintain sufficient contrast for accessibility

requirements.text: Reorder the route configuration in App.tsx so that the About page (/about) appears immediately after the Home page (/) in the navigation sequence

quotes: MAKE THE ABOTU PAGE RIGHT AFTER THE HOME PAGE IT HSOULD BE POSITIONS RIGHT AFTER THE HOMEPAGE

acceptanceCriteria: Route order in App.tsx places /about immediately after /
Navigation links in Navigation.tsx reflect the new ordering with About appearing second

requirements.text: Extend the PollutionMap component to include all countries worldwide with their respective pollution data and ensure all country SVG paths are properly rendered and interactive

quotes: FOR GOD'S SAKE PLEASE MAKE THE MAP WORK FOR AL COUNTRIES

acceptanceCriteria: Map displays all countries with proper geographic boundaries
Each country has associated pollution data (MWI score)
All countries are clickable and show tooltips on hover
Country colors reflect their pollution levels correctly

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo data structures
Maintain existing forest and ocean color palette system
nonGoals: Changing the overall site theme or color palette beyond the navigation menu
Modifying the structure or content of other pages
Adding new map features beyond country coverage
